channel.title: Little theory about packaging a rsps into a jar to run on a rooted mobile device
channel.description: of course this is possible, but being a rookie i would like to have some of the greatest minds in java discuss this. pros/cons. it would be incredible if someone could point me in the right direction, you know show me the door and ill walk through it.

item.title: Little theory about packaging a rsps into a jar to run on a rooted mobile device
item.dc:creator: @gawdz666 gawdz666
item.description:
@gawdz666 wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:7, topic:553817”][quote author=icexpanda link=topic=672740.msg4498714#msg4498714 date=1447289837]
i would like to have some of the greatest minds in java discuss this.
[/quote]

some of the greatest minds in java discuss this.

greatest minds in java discuss this.

greatest minds in java

what the fudge m8[/quote]

…Anyways are you talking about hosting the server on a mobile device or just running a client because your question isn’t really straight forward.

Read full topic
